project.Title: The Inquisitor
project.ItemDescription:
New Class Mod, the Inquisitor, for Darkest Dungeon ================================================
This mod brings you the inquisitor as a new playable class in Darkest Dungeon.
The Inquisitor is made for one thing : Weaken. While not the best tank out there, he is the ultimate crowd-control frontline debuffer. Stun, Mark, Shuffle and debuff your foes in a lot of ways! The Inquisitor will bring the light in the Darkest Dungeon!
Combat skills :
Burn the Flesh : launch 21, target : 1&2, dmg : -50%, effect : debuff dmg, debuff prot, torch +3 Cage of Flames : launch 21, target : 1&2&3&4, dmg : -90%, effect : debuff dodge, debuff acc, debuff spd, torch +3 In the Light : launch 321, target : 3&4, dmg : -50%, effect : pull 1, debuff res blight/bleed, debuff dodge, torch +3 Raise the Alarm : launch 21, target 1&2, dmg : -70%, efect : stun, mark, kockback 1 Rallying Shout : launch : 321, target @4&3&2&1, effect : buff dmg, buff acc, buff crit, buff stack heal Do not Fear : launch : 21, target @4321, forward 1, effect : protect, self mark, self buff dodge, self riposte With Fire came Disparity : launch : 321, target @4&3&2&1, effect : heal, stress heal, torch +3
================================================
